cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo ;[google-chrome]
name=google-chrome
baseurl=http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/rpm/stable/$basearch
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo yum -y install google-chrome-stable chromedriver screen
curl -s https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | sudo python
sudo -H pip install selenium

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

#!/bin/bash
echo ;[google-chrome]
name=google-chrome
baseurl=http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/rpm/stable/$basearch
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
